name: SNIPER TANKS
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
SNIPER TANKS is an arena for tanks, where the strongest wins!

Participate in battles on tanks, where the strongest wins! Destroy enemy tanks to gain points. Do not forget to repair the tank in time, otherwise the loss is inevitable.

On your side there is you, you know, where your opponent shoots, but the enemy, can only guess about your further actions.

On your side, speed and maneuverability. On the side of the invader - number! It will not be an equal fight!

The enemy may be stronger, but the invader is doomed to lose. They fight for gold, and we, for freedom!

So get yourself the glory in the arena! Forward to the victory!
